name: EX Drones THE GLITCHED DIMENSIONS MAC VERSION
name_original: EX Drones THE GLITCHED DIMENSIONS MAC VERSION
description:
The Official EX Drones THE GLITCHED DIMENSIONS IS NOW AVAILABLE ON MAC VERSION!

EX DRONES THE GLITCHED DIMENSIONS IS A DLC FOR THE ORIGINAL GAME 'EX DRONES'

STORY:

WHILE THE CHARACTER OF EX DRONES TRIED TO ELIMINATE  SOME DRONES  SOMETHING STRANGE HAPPENED, HE TELEPORTED TO A DIFFERENT  DIMENSIONS AS A RESULT, THE DIMENSIONS GLITCHED WILL YOU FIND YOUR WAY BACK HOME?
